author: smurphos
name: Cinnamox-Willow-Grove
description: NEW - GTK3.20+ supported as-well as GTK3.18. Willow-Grove features a soothing leafy green colour scheme with gradients, gentle curves, light borders and text. It includes a Cinnamon Desktop theme along with matching Numix style GTK2, GTK3 and Metacity1 themes for a full Cinnamox experience.
